name: Balance Your Energy - Seven Chakra Crystal Infused Candle
description:
Each Candle has been crystal infused with crystals that best resonate with the spiritual healing purpose and may assist in providing healing that could benefit you.





Includes
Clear Quartz, Amethyst, Lapis Lazuli, Green Aventurine, Citrine, Carnelian & Red Jasper, Salted Caramel Scent, Rose Petals and Chamomile buds.

May assist with the overall balance and aligning of your chakras.




Perfect as an aromatherapy ornament or for burning.



All candles are handmade from essential oils or fragrance oils & organic soy wax. 

Each candle is unique and different therefore item received may vary slightly to images shown.
 
Burn Time: approx. 48 Hours
Weight: Roughly 285 grams of Soy Wax

Please note: If your order is being shipped to you, items on top of candle may move in transit, but can be easily readjusted once received.
